name: Wordbox: Brain Puzzle Game
description:
If you're looking to kick your brain into gear, then nothing will match the original WordBox Puzzle!

It share a common goal with Rubik's Cube : reorganizing all sides so that each column, each row, and each tile . This can be accomplished through forming words by twisting individual pieces into uncomfortably elaborate configurations.

Check out how this enhanced 2-D style puzzle design handles contrast and depth!

Join Discord server

https://discord.gg/QhRVcue3Ar
